title: The Prisoner
description: I am not a number! I am a free man!Based on the outstanding TV series starring Patrick McGoohanHe's a top-level agent. Highly skilled and ultra-secret. But he wants out. They won't let him quit. He quits anyway. Then suddenly comes the dawn when he wakes up in captivity. A pleasant, old-style village that's packed solid with electronic surveillance hardware.He is the Prisoner.If he was good enough, sharp enough to be a top flight cloak-and-dagger man, is he good enough to escape the men who've chained his life to the wall?
author: Thomas M. Disch
